author: timesunion.com
title: Rodger's Quick Take
text: The Mets can make it nearly impossible for the Cubs to come back and win the NL Championship Series if they win Game 3 on Tuesday night at Wrigley Field. The Mets' starting pitching has been stellar, and there is no reason to believe that will change when Jacob deGrom takes the mound opposite Kyle Hendricks DeGrom might be better than both Matt Harvey and Noah Syndergaard , and that's scary. I am not putting the Mets into the World Series just yet, but I will if they take a 3-0 series lead. NewsChannel 13's Rodger Wyland can be heard weekdays from 9 a.m. to noon on WOFX 980 AM.
